1080270.name: Fantasy Grounds - Deadlands Noir: His Brother's Keeper (Savage Worlds)
1080270.description:
Deadlands Noir: His Brother's Keeper

His Brother's Keeper is an adventure by Brand Manager
John Goff for
Deadlands Noir, set in 1930s New Orleans. It takes the heroes from the Garden District's posh mansions to the edge of the bayous and back again. It contains a mix of investigation and combat, and is suitable for characters of all Ranks, although the Marshal may want to toughen up the foes for Veteran or higher characters.
This adventure requires the
Savage Worlds core rules and
Deadlands Noir to play.
His Brother's Keeper originally published in the
Savage Worlds Explorer Issue 2, available in print directly from Pinnacle.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Scott Geeding
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
